data.lyric:
[ti:Die From A Broken Heart]
[ar:Maddie & Tae]
[al:Die From A Broken Heart]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Die From A Broken Heart - Maddie & Tae
[00:13.00]Hey Momma how do you get a red wine stain
[00:16.52]Out of your favorite dress
[00:19.53]Black mascara off a pillow case
[00:22.51]Cure a one-too-many headache
[00:25.89]Momma can I come and maybe stay a few days
[00:29.08]This weekend or next
[00:31.71]And hey how do you get a red wine stain
[00:35.37]Out of your favorite dress
[00:37.83]How does he sleep at night
[00:40.95]Momma the nerve of this guy
[00:44.33]To leave me so easy
[00:47.31]Am I gonna be alright
[00:50.36]I wanna kick myself for falling so hard
[00:54.14]Momma can you die from a broken heart
[01:03.73]Can you ask Daddy if he's got time
[01:06.92]To come and look at my front door
[01:09.70]It got slammed last night
[01:12.78]And now it don't close right
[01:15.94]And just promise that you won't tell him everything
[01:19.41]And keep that pistol in the drawer
[01:22.37]Momma please don't say
[01:25.39]I'm gonna laugh about this someday
[01:28.56]You didn't see the way he drove away
[01:31.57]How does he sleep at night
[01:34.56]Momma the nerve of this guy
[01:37.96]To leave me so easy
[01:40.66]Am I gonna be alright
[01:44.11]I wanna kick myself for falling so hard
[01:47.84]Momma can you die from a broken heart
[01:55.67]Oh a broken heart
[02:03.36]Can your knees give out from praying so hard
[02:06.04]Praying so hard
[02:06.87]Can you go blind from crying in the dark
[02:09.86]Was it ever really real
[02:12.23]If he don't feel like I feel
[02:15.73]How does he sleep at night
[02:18.69]Momma the nerve of this guy
[02:22.12]To leave me so easy
[02:25.07]Am I gonna be alright
[02:28.27]How does he sleep at night
[02:31.38]Momma the nerve of this guy
[02:34.74]To leave me so easy
[02:37.78]Am I gonna be alright
[02:40.88]I wanna kick myself for falling so hard
[02:44.72]Momma can you die from a broken heart
[02:53.45]A broken heart
data.trans:
[ti:Die From A Broken Heart]
[ar:Maddie & Tae]
[al:Die From A Broken Heart]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:13.00]嘿 妈妈 最爱的裙子沾上了红酒渍
[00:16.52]要怎么洗掉啊
[00:19.53]枕套上的黑色睫毛膏怎么洗呢
[00:22.51]怎样治愈反复发作的头痛呀
[00:25.89]妈妈 我能不能来你家待几天呢
[00:29.08]这周末或者下周末
[00:31.71]嘿 最爱的裙子沾上了红酒渍
[00:35.37]要怎么洗掉啊
[00:37.83]他夜里怎么睡得着
[00:40.95]妈妈 这个男人真胆大
[00:44.33]就这样离我而去了
[00:47.31]我会不会好起来
[00:50.36]我这样沉沦 真想踹自己一脚
[00:54.14]妈妈 人会不会因为心碎而死去呀
[01:03.73]你能不能问问爸爸 他有没有时间
[01:06.92]来帮我看看我家前门咋回事啊
[01:09.70]昨晚被狠狠地摔了一下
[01:12.78]现在关不严了
[01:15.94]不过你得答应我 不要对他说太多
[01:19.41]暂时帮我保守秘密
[01:22.37]妈妈 请不要说
[01:25.39]总有一天我会笑着面对这件事
[01:28.56]你没有看到他开车远去的样子
[01:31.57]他夜里怎么睡得着
[01:34.56]妈妈 这个男人真胆大
[01:37.96]就这样离我而去了
[01:40.66]我会不会好起来
[01:44.11]我这样沉沦 真想踹自己一脚
[01:47.84]妈妈 人会不会因为心碎而死去呀
[01:55.67]破碎的心
[02:03.36]人会不会因为跪地祈祷得太狠而磨破膝盖
[02:06.04]呼天抢地那种祈祷
[02:06.87]人会不会因为流太多泪水而失明
[02:09.86]这一切都是真的吗
[02:12.23]他不明白我的感受
[02:15.73]他夜里怎么睡得着
[02:18.69]妈妈 这个男人真胆大
[02:22.12]就这样离我而去了
[02:25.07]我会不会好起来
[02:28.27]他夜里怎么睡得着
[02:31.38]妈妈 这个男人真胆大
[02:34.74]就这样离我而去了
[02:37.78]我会不会好起来
[02:40.88]我这样沉沦 真想踹自己一脚
[02:44.72]妈妈 人会不会因为心碎而死去呀
[02:53.45]破碎的心
